00111 //----------------------------------------------------------
00112 __forceinline void
00113 LerpVaryingDeltas( SVec4* output, const SVec4* input0, const SVec4* input1, float t )
00114 {
00115         __asm
00116         {
00117                 ; setup pointers.
00118                 mov                     eax, input0;
00119                 mov                     esi, input1;
00120                 mov                     edi, output;
00121 
00122                 ; load the interpolant.
00123                 movss           xmm0, t
00124                 shufps          xmm0, xmm0, 00000000b
00125                 movaps          xmm1, xmm0;
00126                 movaps          xmm2, xmm0;
00127 
00128                 ; perform a series of multiply-adds.
00129                 mulps           xmm0, [esi+0]
00130                 addps           xmm0, [eax+0]
00131                 mulps           xmm1, [esi+16]
00132                 addps           xmm1, [eax+16]
00133                 mulps           xmm2, [esi+32]
00134                 addps           xmm2, [eax+32]
00135 
00136                 movaps          [edi+0], xmm0
00137                 movaps          [edi+16], xmm1
00138                 movaps          [edi+32], xmm2
00139         };
00140 }
00141 */

00143 class IXNullRT : public GrSoftwareRTBase
00144 {
00145 public:
00146         IXNullRT()
00147         {
00148                 _buffer = ( unsigned char* )AlignedAlloc( 16, RENDER_TILE_SIZE );
00149         }
00150 
00151         ~IXNullRT()
00152         {
00153                 AlignedFree( _buffer );
00154         }
00155 
00156         unsigned int            GetWidth() const                        {       return 32767;           }
00157         unsigned int            GetHeight() const                       {       return 32767;           }
00158         unsigned int            GetBytesPerPel() const          {       return 0;                       }
00159         unsigned int            GetStride() const                       {       return GetBytesPerPel() * GetWidth();                   }
00160         unsigned int            GetTile8x8Stride() const        {       return GetBytesPerPel() * RENDER_TILE_SIZE;             }
00161         unsigned char*          BeginTile8x8( unsigned int x, unsigned int y )                          {       return _buffer;         }
00162         unsigned char*          BeginTile8x8WriteOnly( unsigned int x, unsigned int y )         {       return _buffer;         }
00163         void                            EndTile8x8( unsigned int x, unsigned int y )                            { }
00164 
00165         unsigned char*          GetData() const                         {       return 0;                       }
00166 
00169         void                            Clear( void* pelClearData );
00170 
00171 private:
00172         unsigned char*          _buffer;
00173 };

00183 //----------------------------------------------------------
00184 GrSoftwareRasterizer::GrSoftwareRasterizer()
00185 : _viewportScale( 1.0f, 1.0f )
00186 , _viewportOffset( 0.0f, 0.0f )
00187 , _vertexProg( 0 )
00188 , _fragmentProg( 0 )
00189 , _nullRT( new IXNullRT() )
00190 , _targetWidth( 0 )
00191 , _targetHeight( 0 )
00192 , _floatTargetWidth( 0 )
00193 , _floatTargetHeight( 0 )
00194 , _scratchBuffer( new SPolygonVertex[ SCRATCH_BUFFER_SIZE ] )
00195 {
00197         MemSet( _renderTarget, 0, sizeof( _renderTarget ) );
00198         MemSet( _targetBPP, 0, sizeof( _targetBPP ) );
00199         MemSet( _blockStride, 0, sizeof( _blockStride ) );
00200 
00202         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < MAX_RENDER_TARGET_COUNT; ++i )
00203                 _renderTarget[ i ] = _nullRT;
00204 }
00205 
00206 //----------------------------------------------------------
00207 GrSoftwareRasterizer::~GrSoftwareRasterizer()
00208 {
00209         delete _nullRT;
00210 
00212         delete[] _scratchBuffer;
00213 }

00220 //----------------------------------------------------------
00221 void
00222 GrSoftwareRasterizer::SetRenderTarget( unsigned int targetIdx, GrSoftwareRTBase* target )
00223 {
00225         if ( target == 0 )
00226                 target = _nullRT;
00227 
00229         B_ASSERT( targetIdx < MAX_RENDER_TARGET_COUNT );
00230 
00232         _renderTarget[ targetIdx ] = target;
00233 
00235         _targetWidth = 0x7FFFFFFF;
00236         _targetHeight = 0x7FFFFFFF;
00237         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < MAX_RENDER_TARGET_COUNT; ++i )
00238         {
00240                 GrSoftwareRTBase* curRT = _renderTarget[ i ];
00241 
00243                 _targetBPP[ i ] = curRT->GetBytesPerPel();
00244                 _blockStride[ i ] = curRT->GetTile8x8Stride();
00245 
00247                 if ( _renderTarget[ i ] == _nullRT )
00248                         continue;
00249 
00253                 _targetWidth = Min( _targetWidth, ( int )curRT->GetWidth() );
00254                 _targetHeight = Min( _targetHeight, ( int )curRT->GetHeight() );
00255         }
00256         if ( _targetWidth == ~0 )
00257                 _targetWidth = 0;
00258         if ( _targetHeight == ~0 )
00259                 _targetHeight = 0;
00260         
00261         _floatTargetWidth = ( float )_targetWidth;
00262         _floatTargetHeight = ( float )_targetHeight;
00263 }

00289 //----------------------------------------------------------
00290 void
00291 GrSoftwareRasterizer::SetVertexConstants( unsigned int idx, const MMat4x4& value )
00292 {
00293         B_ASSERT( idx < (64-4) );
00294         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 4; ++i )
00295         {
00296                 _vertexConstants[ idx + i ].x = value( i, 0 );
00297                 _vertexConstants[ idx + i ].y = value( i, 1 );
00298                 _vertexConstants[ idx + i ].z = value( i, 2 );
00299                 _vertexConstants[ idx + i ].w = value( i, 3 );
00300         }
00301 }
00302

00349 //----------------------------------------------------------
00350 void
00351 GrSoftwareRasterizer::RenderPolygon( const GrPolygon& polygon )
00352 {
00353         B_ASSERT( _renderTarget != 0 );
00354         B_ASSERT( _vertexProg != 0 && _fragmentProg != 0 );
00355 
00357         unsigned int triCount = ( polygon.GetVertexCount() - 2 );
00358         unsigned int vertCount = 3 * triCount;
00359 
00361         SPolygonVertex* vertices = ( SPolygonVertex* )alloca( vertCount * sizeof( SPolygonVertex ) );
00362 
00364         polygon.Triangulate( vertices );
00365 
00367         RenderTriangleList( vertices, triCount );
00368 }
00369 
00370 //----------------------------------------------------------
00371 void
00372 GrSoftwareRasterizer::RenderPolygons( const std::vector< GrPolygon* >& polygons )
00373 {
00374         B_ASSERT( _renderTarget != 0 );
00375         B_ASSERT( _vertexProg != 0 && _fragmentProg != 0 );
00376 
00378         SPolygonVertex* curVertexOffset = _scratchBuffer;
00379         unsigned int curVertexCount = 0;
00380         unsigned int curTriCount = 0;
00381         unsigned int polygonCount = ( unsigned int )polygons.size();
00382         unsigned int i = 0;
00383         while( polygonCount-- > 0 )
00384         {
00386                 GrPolygon* curPoly = polygons[ i ];
00387                 if ( ( curVertexCount + curPoly->GetVertexCount() ) > SCRATCH_BUFFER_SIZE )
00388                 {
00390                         RenderTriangleList( _scratchBuffer, curTriCount );
00391                         curVertexOffset = _scratchBuffer;
00392                         curTriCount = 0;
00393                         curVertexCount = 0;
00394                 }
00395 
00397                 curPoly->Triangulate( curVertexOffset );
00398                 curVertexOffset += curPoly->GetVertexCount();
00399 
00401                 ++i;
00402         }
00403 
00405         if ( curTriCount )
00406                 RenderTriangleList( _scratchBuffer, curTriCount );
00407 }
00408 
00409 //----------------------------------------------------------
00410 void
00411 GrSoftwareRasterizer::RenderTriangleList( const SPolygonVertex* vertices, unsigned int triCount )
00412 {
00413         B_ASSERT( _vertexProg != 0 && _fragmentProg != 0 );
00414         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < triCount; ++i )
00415         {
00417                 RenderTriangle( vertices );
00418 
00420                 vertices += 3;
00421         }
00422 }
00423 
00424 
00425 //==========================================================
00427 //==========================================================
00428 
00429 #define iround( x )                     ( int )( ( x ) + 0.5 )
00430 
00431 #include "xmmintrin.h"
00432 
00434 #define VARYING_COUNT           4
00435 
00436 //              int DUDX;
00437 //              int DUDY;
00438 //              int DVDX;
00439 //              int DVDY;
00440 
00446 /*
00447                 x0 * DUDX + y0 * DUDY = U0
00448                 x1 * DUDX + y1 * DUDY = U1
00449                 --------------------------
00450 
00451                 solve using the system of equations with matrices.
00452 
00453                 | x0  y0 |   | U0 |
00454                 | x1  y1 | = | U1 |
00455 
00456                 det = 1 / (y1*x0 - y0*x1);
00457 
00458                                         | y1 -y0 |
00459                 inv = det * |-x1  x0 |
00460 
00461                           | U0 |
00462                 inv * | U1 |
00463             
00464 
00465 
00466                 x0 * DVDX + y0 * DVDY = V0
00467                 x1 * DVDX + y1 * DVDY = V1
00468                 --------------------------
00469 
00470                 int U1 = iround( 65536.0f * varyings[0].x );
00471                 int U2 = iround( 65536.0f * varyings[4].x );
00472                 int U3 = iround( 65536.0f * varyings[8].x );
00473                 int V1 = iround( 65536.0f * varyings[0].y );
00474                 int V2 = iround( 65536.0f * varyings[4].y );
00475                 int V3 = iround( 65536.0f * varyings[8].y );
00476 */
00477 /*              else
00478                 {
00479                         curVarying[ v ].x = varyings[2*VARYING_COUNT+v].x - varyings[1*VARYING_COUNT+v].x;
00480                         curVarying[ v ].y = varyings[2*VARYING_COUNT+v].y - varyings[1*VARYING_COUNT+v].y;
00481                         curVarying[ v ].z = varyings[2*VARYING_COUNT+v].z - varyings[1*VARYING_COUNT+v].z;
00482                         curVarying[ v ].w = varyings[2*VARYING_COUNT+v].w - varyings[1*VARYING_COUNT+v].w;
00483 
00484                         varyingDX[ v ].x = ( Y3 * curVarying[ v ].x  + -Y2 * curVarying[ v ].x ) / invDet2;
00485                         varyingDX[ v ].y = ( Y3 * curVarying[ v ].y  + -Y2 * curVarying[ v ].y ) / invDet2;
00486                         varyingDX[ v ].z = ( Y3 * curVarying[ v ].z  + -Y2 * curVarying[ v ].z ) / invDet2;
00487                         varyingDX[ v ].w = ( Y3 * curVarying[ v ].w  + -Y2 * curVarying[ v ].w ) / invDet2;
00488 
00489                         varyingDY[ v ].x = (-X3 * curVarying[ v ].x  +  X2 * curVarying[ v ].x ) / invDet2;
00490                         varyingDY[ v ].y = (-X3 * curVarying[ v ].y  +  X2 * curVarying[ v ].y ) / invDet2;
00491                         varyingDY[ v ].z = (-X3 * curVarying[ v ].z  +  X2 * curVarying[ v ].z ) / invDet2;
00492                         varyingDY[ v ].w = (-X3 * curVarying[ v ].w  +  X2 * curVarying[ v ].w ) / invDet2;
00493                 }
00494 */
00495 
00496 //----------------------------------------------------------
00497 void
00498 GrSoftwareRasterizer::RenderTriangle( const SPolygonVertex* vertices )
00499 {
00501         SVec4 verts[ 3 ];
00502         //static __declspec( align( 16 ) ) SVec4 varyings[ 12 ];
00503         ALIGNED_VAR( 16, SVec4 varyings[ 3 * VARYING_COUNT ] );
00504 
00506         if ( _targetWidth == 0 || _targetHeight == 0 )
00507                 return;
00508 
00510         _vertexProg( verts[ 0 ], varyings + 0 * VARYING_COUNT, _vertexConstants, vertices[ 0 ] );
00511         _vertexProg( verts[ 1 ], varyings + 1 * VARYING_COUNT, _vertexConstants, vertices[ 1 ] );
00512         _vertexProg( verts[ 2 ], varyings + 2 * VARYING_COUNT, _vertexConstants, vertices[ 2 ] );
00513 
00515         verts[ 0 ].x = _viewportScale.x * verts[ 0 ].x + _viewportOffset.x;
00516         verts[ 0 ].y = _viewportScale.y * verts[ 0 ].y + _viewportOffset.y;
00517         verts[ 1 ].x = _viewportScale.x * verts[ 1 ].x + _viewportOffset.x;
00518         verts[ 1 ].y = _viewportScale.y * verts[ 1 ].y + _viewportOffset.y;
00519         verts[ 2 ].x = _viewportScale.x * verts[ 2 ].x + _viewportOffset.x;
00520         verts[ 2 ].y = _viewportScale.y * verts[ 2 ].y + _viewportOffset.y;
00521 
00523     const int Y1 = iround(16.0f * ( 0.5f * verts[ 0 ].y + 0.5f ) * _floatTargetHeight);
00524     const int Y2 = iround(16.0f * ( 0.5f * verts[ 1 ].y + 0.5f ) * _floatTargetHeight);
00525     const int Y3 = iround(16.0f * ( 0.5f * verts[ 2 ].y + 0.5f ) * _floatTargetHeight);
00526     const int X1 = iround(16.0f * ( 0.5f * verts[ 0 ].x + 0.5f ) * _floatTargetWidth);
00527     const int X2 = iround(16.0f * ( 0.5f * verts[ 1 ].x + 0.5f ) * _floatTargetWidth);
00528     const int X3 = iround(16.0f * ( 0.5f * verts[ 2 ].x + 0.5f ) * _floatTargetWidth);
00529 
00531     int minx = (Min3(X1, X2, X3) + 0xF) >> 4;
00532     int maxx = (Max3(X1, X2, X3) + 0xF) >> 4;
00533     int miny = (Min3(Y1, Y2, Y3) + 0xF) >> 4;
00534     int maxy = (Max3(Y1, Y2, Y3) + 0xF) >> 4;
00535 
00537 //      if ( minx == maxx || miny == maxy )
00538 //              return;
00539 
00541         int height = maxy - miny;
00542 
00544         const float EX1 = float( X2 - X1 ) / 16.0f;
00545         const float EX2 = float( X3 - X1 ) / 16.0f;
00546         const float EY1 = float( Y2 - Y1 ) / 16.0f;
00547         const float EY2 = float( Y3 - Y1 ) / 16.0f;
00548 
00550         float invDet = 1.0f / ( float )( EY2*EX1 - EY1*EX2 );
00551 
00553         ALIGNED_VAR( 16, SVec4 varyingDX[ VARYING_COUNT ] );    
00554         ALIGNED_VAR( 16, SVec4 varyingDY[ VARYING_COUNT ] );    
00555         ALIGNED_VAR( 16, SVec4 curVarying[ VARYING_COUNT ] );
00556         ALIGNED_VAR( 16, SVec4 curPelVarying[ VARYING_COUNT ] );
00557         for ( int v = 0; v < VARYING_COUNT; ++v )
00558         {
00559                 float VDX1 = varyings[ 1 * VARYING_COUNT + v ].x - varyings[ v ].x;
00560                 float VDX2 = varyings[ 2 * VARYING_COUNT + v ].x - varyings[ v ].x;
00561                 float VDY1 = varyings[ 1 * VARYING_COUNT + v ].y - varyings[ v ].y;
00562                 float VDY2 = varyings[ 2 * VARYING_COUNT + v ].y - varyings[ v ].y;
00563                 float VDZ1 = varyings[ 1 * VARYING_COUNT + v ].z - varyings[ v ].z;
00564                 float VDZ2 = varyings[ 2 * VARYING_COUNT + v ].z - varyings[ v ].z;
00565                 float VDW1 = varyings[ 1 * VARYING_COUNT + v ].w - varyings[ v ].w;
00566                 float VDW2 = varyings[ 2 * VARYING_COUNT + v ].w - varyings[ v ].w;
00567 
00568                 varyingDX[ v ].x = invDet * ( EY2 * VDX1  + -EY1 * VDX2 );
00569                 varyingDX[ v ].y = invDet * ( EY2 * VDY1  + -EY1 * VDY2 );
00570                 varyingDX[ v ].z = invDet * ( EY2 * VDZ1  + -EY1 * VDZ2 );
00571                 varyingDX[ v ].w = invDet * ( EY2 * VDW1  + -EY1 * VDW2 );
00572 
00573                 varyingDY[ v ].x = invDet * (-EX2 * VDX1  +  EX1 * VDX2 );
00574                 varyingDY[ v ].y = invDet * (-EX2 * VDY1  +  EX1 * VDY2 );
00575                 varyingDY[ v ].z = invDet * (-EX2 * VDZ1  +  EX1 * VDZ2 );
00576                 varyingDY[ v ].w = invDet * (-EX2 * VDW1  +  EX1 * VDW2 );
00577 
00579                 curVarying[ v ] =  varyings[ v ];
00580                 curVarying[ v ] += -float( X1 >> 4 ) * varyingDX[ v ];
00581                 curVarying[ v ] += -float( Y1 >> 4 ) * varyingDY[ v ];
00582         }
00583 
00585     int DX12 = X1 - X2;
00586     int DX23 = X2 - X3;
00587     int DX31 = X3 - X1;
00588 
00589     int DY12 = Y1 - Y2;
00590     int DY23 = Y2 - Y3;
00591     int DY31 = Y3 - Y1;
00592 
00594     int C1 = DY12 * X1 - DX12 * Y1;
00595     int C2 = DY23 * X2 - DX23 * Y2;
00596     int C3 = DY31 * X3 - DX31 * Y3;
00597 
00600     if ( C1 + DX12 * Y3 - DY12 * X3 < 0 )
00601         {
00602                 DX12 = -DX12;
00603                 DX23 = -DX23;
00604                 DX31 = -DX31;
00605                 DY12 = -DY12;
00606                 DY23 = -DY23;
00607                 DY31 = -DY31;
00608                 C1 = -C1;
00609                 C2 = -C2;
00610                 C3 = -C3;
00611         }
00612 
00613         if ( _lastPixel )
00614         {
00615                 if ( DY12 < 0 || ( DY12 == 0 && DX12 > 0 ) )
00616                         C1 += 2*65536;
00617 
00618                 if ( DY23 < 0 || ( DY23 == 0 && DX23 > 0 ) )
00619                         C2 += 2*65536;
00620 
00621                 if ( DY31 < 0 || ( DY31 == 0 && DX31 > 0 ) )
00622                         C3 += 2*65536;
00623         }
00624 
00626         if ( DY12 < 0 || ( DY12 == 0 && DX12 > 0 ) )
00627                 ++C1;
00628         if ( DY23 < 0 || ( DY23 == 0 && DX23 > 0 ) )
00629                 ++C2;
00630         if ( DY31 < 0 || ( DY31 == 0 && DX31 > 0 ) )
00631                 ++C3;
00632 
00634     const int FDX12 = DX12 << 4;
00635     const int FDX23 = DX23 << 4;
00636     const int FDX31 = DX31 << 4;
00637 
00638     const int FDY12 = DY12 << 4;
00639     const int FDY23 = DY23 << 4;
00640     const int FDY31 = DY31 << 4;
00641 
00643     const int q = RENDER_TILE_SIZE;
00644 
00646     minx &= RENDER_TILE_INV_MASK;
00647     miny &= RENDER_TILE_INV_MASK;
00648 
00650         minx = Max( minx, 0 );
00651         miny = Max( miny, 0 );
00652         maxx = Min( maxx, _targetWidth );
00653         maxy = Min( maxy, _targetHeight );
00654 
00656     unsigned char* dst[ MAX_RENDER_TARGET_COUNT ];
00657 
00659     for(int y = miny; y < maxy; y += RENDER_TILE_SIZE )
00660     {
00661         int y0 = y << 4;
00662         int y1 = (y + RENDER_TILE_MASK) << 4;
00663                 int C1_DX12_y0 = C1 + DX12 * y0;
00664                 int C1_DX12_y1 = C1 + DX12 * y1;
00665                 int C2_DX23_y0 = C2 + DX23 * y0;
00666                 int C2_DX23_y1 = C2 + DX23 * y1;
00667                 int C3_DX31_y0 = C3 + DX31 * y0;
00668                 int C3_DX31_y1 = C3 + DX31 * y1;
00669 
00670                 for(int x = minx; x < maxx; x += RENDER_TILE_SIZE)
00671         {
00673             int x0 = x << 4;
00674             int x1 = (x + RENDER_TILE_MASK) << 4;
00675 
00677             bool a00 = C1_DX12_y0 - DY12 * x0 > 0;
00678             bool a10 = C1_DX12_y0 - DY12 * x1 > 0;
00679             bool a01 = C1_DX12_y1 - DY12 * x0 > 0;
00680             bool a11 = C1_DX12_y1 - DY12 * x1 > 0;
00681             int a = (a00 << 0) | (a10 << 1) | (a01 << 2) | (a11 << 3);
00682 
00683             bool b00 = C2_DX23_y0 - DY23 * x0 > 0;
00684             bool b10 = C2_DX23_y0 - DY23 * x1 > 0;
00685             bool b01 = C2_DX23_y1 - DY23 * x0 > 0;
00686             bool b11 = C2_DX23_y1 - DY23 * x1 > 0;
00687             int b = (b00 << 0) | (b10 << 1) | (b01 << 2) | (b11 << 3);
00688 
00689             bool c00 = C3_DX31_y0 - DY31 * x0 > 0;
00690             bool c10 = C3_DX31_y0 - DY31 * x1 > 0;
00691             bool c01 = C3_DX31_y1 - DY31 * x0 > 0;
00692             bool c11 = C3_DX31_y1 - DY31 * x1 > 0;
00693             int c = (c00 << 0) | (c10 << 1) | (c01 << 2) | (c11 << 3);
00694 
00696             if ( a == 0x0 || b == 0x0 || c == 0x0 )
00697                                 continue;
00698 
00700                         for ( int i = 0; i < MAX_RENDER_TARGET_COUNT; ++i )
00701                                 dst[ i ] = _renderTarget[ i ]->BeginTile8x8( x, y );
00702 
00704             if ( a == 0xF && b == 0xF && c == 0xF )
00705             {
00706                 for(int iy = y; iy < ( y + RENDER_TILE_SIZE ); ++iy)
00707                 {
00712                                         for(int ix = x; ix < x + RENDER_TILE_SIZE; ++ix /*, curU += DUDY, curV += DUDY*/)
00713                     {
00714                                                 __asm
00715                                                 {
00716                                                         ; setup our operation.
00717                                                         mov                     ecx, VARYING_COUNT
00718                                                         lea                     esi, curVarying
00719                                                         lea                     edx, varyingDX
00720                                                         lea                     eax, varyingDY
00721                                                         lea                     edi, curPelVarying
00722 
00723                                                         ; convert ix and iy to floating point.
00724                                                         movd            xmm3, ix
00725                                                         pshufd          xmm3, xmm3, 00000000b
00726                                                         movd            xmm4, iy
00727                                                         pshufd          xmm4, xmm4, 00000000b
00728                                                         cvtdq2ps        xmm3, xmm3
00729                                                         cvtdq2ps        xmm4, xmm4
00730 
00731                                                 $loop:
00732                                                         movaps          xmm0, [esi]
00733                                                         movaps          xmm1, [edx]
00734                                                         movaps          xmm2, [eax]
00735 
00736                                                         mulps           xmm1, xmm3
00737                                                         mulps           xmm2, xmm4
00738                                                         addps           xmm0, xmm1
00739                                                         addps           xmm0, xmm2
00740 
00741                                                         movaps          [edi], xmm0

00743                                                         add                     esi, 16
00744                                                         add                     edx, 16
00745                                                         add                     eax, 16
00746                                                         add                     edi, 16
00747                                                         dec                     ecx
00748                                                         jnz $loop
00749                                                 }
00750 //                                              for (int v = 0; v < VARYING_COUNT; ++v)
00751 //                                              {
00752 //                                                      curPelVarying[ v ] =  curVarying[ v ];
00753 //                                                      curPelVarying[ v ] += float( ix ) * varyingDX[ v ];
00754 //                                                      curPelVarying[ v ] += float( iy ) * varyingDY[ v ];
00755 //                                              }
00756 
00758                                                 _fragmentProg( dst, _targetBPP, _fragmentConstants, curPelVarying, varyingDX, varyingDY, _samplers );
00759 
00761                                                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < MAX_RENDER_TARGET_COUNT; ++i )
00762                                                         dst[ i ] += _targetBPP[ i ];
00763                     }
00764                 }
00765             }
00766             else        
00767             {
00768                 int CY1 = C1 + DX12 * y0 - DY12 * x0;
00769                 int CY2 = C2 + DX23 * y0 - DY23 * x0;
00770                 int CY3 = C3 + DX31 * y0 - DY31 * x0;
00771 
00772                 for(int iy = y; iy < ( y + RENDER_TILE_SIZE ); ++iy)
00773                 {
00774                     int CX1 = CY1;
00775                     int CX2 = CY2;
00776                     int CX3 = CY3;
00777 
00778                     for( int ix = x; ix < x + RENDER_TILE_SIZE; ++ix )
00779                     {
00780                         if ( CX1 > 0 && CX2 > 0 && CX3 > 0 )
00781                         {
00783                                                         __asm
00784                                                         {
00785                                                                 ; setup our operation.
00786                                                                 mov                     ecx, VARYING_COUNT
00787                                                                 lea                     esi, curVarying
00788                                                                 lea                     edx, varyingDX
00789                                                                 lea                     eax, varyingDY
00790                                                                 lea                     edi, curPelVarying
00791 
00792                                                                 ; convert ix and iy to floating point.
00793                                                                 movd            xmm3, ix
00794                                                                 pshufd          xmm3, xmm3, 00000000b
00795                                                                 movd            xmm4, iy
00796                                                                 pshufd          xmm4, xmm4, 00000000b
00797                                                                 cvtdq2ps        xmm3, xmm3
00798                                                                 cvtdq2ps        xmm4, xmm4
00799 
00800                                                         $loop2:
00801                                                                 movaps          xmm0, [esi]
00802                                                                 movaps          xmm1, [edx]
00803                                                                 movaps          xmm2, [eax]
00804 
00805                                                                 mulps           xmm1, xmm3
00806                                                                 mulps           xmm2, xmm4
00807                                                                 addps           xmm0, xmm1
00808                                                                 addps           xmm0, xmm2
00809 
00810                                                                 movaps          [edi], xmm0
00811

00813                                                                 add                     edx, 16
00814                                                                 add                     eax, 16
00815                                                                 add                     edi, 16
00816                                                                 dec                     ecx
00817                                                                 jnz $loop2
00818                                                         }
00819 
00821                                                         _fragmentProg( dst, _targetBPP, _fragmentConstants, curPelVarying, varyingDX, varyingDY, _samplers );
00822                         }
00823 
00825                                                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < MAX_RENDER_TARGET_COUNT; ++i )
00826                                                         dst[ i ] += _targetBPP[ i ];
00827 
00828                                                 CX1 -= FDY12;
00829                         CX2 -= FDY23;
00830                         CX3 -= FDY31;
00831                     }
00832 
00833                     CY1 += FDX12;
00834                     CY2 += FDX23;
00835                     CY3 += FDX31;
00836                 }
00837             }
00838 
00840                         for ( int i = 0; i < MAX_RENDER_TARGET_COUNT; ++i )
00841                                 _renderTarget[ i ]->EndTile8x8( x, y );
00842         }
